question: Who won Austrian Grand Prix?

question: India has ranked________ in terms of money parked by its citizens and enterprises with Swiss banks.

question: Who has become the first civil servant and IPS officer to achieve the 7 Summits challenge?

question: Which State government has started DASTAK campaign against communicative diseases Acute Encephalitis Syndrome?

question: When will Sawan Shivratri be observed in 2019?
description: Sawan Shivratri will be observed on July 30 this year. The auspicious day is also known as Masa Shivaratri.

question: Which among the following leaders will be seen guest starring in a Man vs Wild episode with host Bear Grylls?
description: PM Narendra Modi will be seen in an all-new avatar in the upcoming Man vs Wild episode with adventurer host Bear Grylls.

question: Who among the following said these lines, "Tinkering with Article 35A will be akin to setting a powder keg on fire"?
description: Mehbooba Mufti, former Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister, warned the ruling government saying that any tinkering with Article 35 A would be akin to setting a powder keg on fire.

question: Former Union Minister Jaipal Reddy passed away on 28th July. How many times was Reddy elected to the Lok Sabha?
description: S Jaipal Reddy was a five-time Lok Sabha MP, four-time MLA, two-time Rajya Sabha MP and union minister under three governments.

question: India has signed an agreement with which among the following countries to enable visa free travel?
description: India and Benin have signed an important agreement for the circulation of diplomatic passport holders from both countries, which will enable diplomatic passports from both Benin and India to travel to both countries without visa.

question: When is the International Tiger Day observed globally?
description: The International Tiger Day is observed across the world on 29 July to raise awareness about declining numbers of wild tigers.

question: K R Ramesh Kumar resigned as Speaker of which State Assembly?
description: K R Ramesh Kumar announced his resignation as the Karnataka Assembly Speaker on July 29, 2019 following the adoption of confidence motion moved by chief minister B S Yediyurappa

question: Who won the Gold Medal in 51 kg category of 23rd President's Cup Boxing Tournament?
description: Mary Kom and Simranjit Kaur won the gold medal in 51kg category and 60kg category respectively each in the 23rd President's Cup Boxing Tournament held in Labuan Bajo, Indonesia.

question: Which city will host the 2020 Khelo India Youth Games?
description: The 2020 Khelo India Youth Games will be held in Guwahati, Assam, as announced by Sports Minister Kiren Rijiju. The third edition of games will begin from 18 January 2020.

question: Which state CM has launched 'Didi Ke Bolo' campaign?
description: Chief Minister of West Bengal Mamata Banerjee launched a unique initiative called 'Didi Ke Bolo' (Tell your sister) campaign to reach out to people of State.

question: Who has been appointed as interim President of Indian Youth Congress?
description: Congress leader Srinivas BV was appointed as the interim President of the Indian Youth Congress (IYC) on Monday by the Congress President, said an All India Congress Committee communique signed by party General Secretary KC Venugopal.

question: Bandhan Bank headquarter is situated in_________.
description: Private lender Bandhan Bank announced the appointment of Siddhartha Sanyal as chief economist and head of research who will spearhead the bank's research and business strategy.

question: World Day Against Trafficking in Persons - Theme for 2019 is_________________.

option.a: Human Trafficking : Call your government to Action
option.b: Human Trafficking : Call your nation to Action
option.c: Human Trafficking : Call your society to Action
option.d: Human Trafficking : Call your world to Action

answer: Human Trafficking : Call your government to Action
description: Theme for 2019 : Human Trafficking : Call your government to Action

question: India's 7th Economic Census begins from _____________.
description: India's seventh Economic Census began from Tripura and a similar task would be launched in other States and Union Territories across the country next month, officials said.

question: Which state secretariat has renamed as Lok Seva Bhavan?
description: Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik on Monday announced in the State Assembly that the Sachivalaya or Secretariat building in Bhubaneswar will now be called 'Lok Seva Bhavan'.

question: Who has been appointed as ombudsman and ethics officer for Indian Federation of Sports Gaming?
description: The Indian Federation of Sports Gaming (IFSG), India's first selfregulatory industry body for the online fantasy sports gaming sector, has appointed justice (retired) A K Sikri as its ombudsman and ethics officer.

question: International Friendship Day is observed on ___________.
description: It was first proposed in 1958 in Paraguay as the 'International Friendship Day'. It was initially promoted by the greeting cards' industry, evidence from social networking sites shows a revival of interest in the holiday that may have grown with the spread of the Internet.

question: Vithalbhai Radadiya is passed away at 61, is associated with___________.
description: In Gujarat, senior BJP leader and former Lok Sabha MP Vithalbhai Radadiya died. He was 61. He was ailing for some time. His son Jayesh Radadiya, who is a Minister in the State government, made the announcement about his death, through a tweet.

question: Centre to conduct the 22nd National Conference on e Governance is held at_________.
description: The Centre is to organize the 22nd National Conference on e- Governance 2019 on 8-9th August, 2019 at Shillong, Meghalaya. For the first time ever, the event is being organized in North-Eastern region of the country.

question: Who has been elected as Karnataka Assembly Speaker?
description: BJP MLA Vishweshwar Hegde Kageri has been elected as Karnataka Assembly Speaker. Kageri was the only one to file the nomination papers for the post following Congress MLA KR Ramesh Kumar's resignation as the Speaker after Congress-JD(S) coalition government

question: Who will be the new Finance Secretary?
description: The government has designated financial services secretary Rajiv Kumar as finance secretary. The appointments committee of the cabinet (ACC) gave its approval to the designation of the 1984 Jharkhand cadre Indian Administrative Service (IAS) officer as the finance secretary.

question: Who will be the new CEO of Mindtree?
description: Former Cognizant executive Debashis Chatterjee will take over as Mindtree's new Chief Executive Officer on August 1, CNBC-TV18 reported quoting sources. Chatterjee served as the executive vice president and president, global delivery, in Cognizant before he quit in May after serving the company for 23 years.

question: According to QS, Which city has been rated as the best student city in India?
description: Bengaluru has been rated as the best student city in India on a ranking that focuses on the number and performance of universities, employers hiring, the city's affordability, desirability and quality of life, and the diversity of student body.

question: According to QS, which city has been rated as the world's best student city ?
description: London is the world's best student city for the second consecutive year, according to the sixth edition of the QS Best Student Cities Ranking compiled by global consultancy QS Quacquarelli Symonds.

question: B.Sai Praneeth has jumped four places to enter in the top 20 players, is associated with ___________.
description: Indian shuttler B.Sai Praneeth has jumped four places to enter in the top 20 players in the latest World Badminton Rankings.

question: Subir Vithal Gokarn is passed away at 60, is associated with_________.
description: Former Reserve Bank of India Deputy Governor Dr Subir Vithal Gokarn (60) passed away after a brief illness. He was the RBI Deputy Governor from 2009-12 and oversaw Monetary Policy Research and Financial Markets department.

question: Infosys launches Cyber Defence Center in __________.
description: Infosys announced the launch of its state-of-the-art Cyber Defence Center in Bucharest, Romania.The Defence Center is an expansion of services delivered through Infosys Digital Innovation Center which opened in Bucharest.
